List 2
Beginners All
This is a very basic list with mostly very common species. If you are new to birds and birding its highly recommended that you first become familiar with this list.
The following contains a list of the biomes in which you might be operation. Before you start to practice these call its advised to have a good grasp of the Core bird list.

Due to the size of the Savanna biome and the amount of bird species it contains the list is divided into 2 parts, Western and Eastern The Western Savanna primarily covers the North West province and its North Western regions.
This includes Pilanesberg National Park and Madikwe which includes Broad-leaved woodland and Acacia savanna
Due to the size of the Savanna biome and the amount of bird species it contains the list is divided into 2 parts, Western and Eastern.
Six lists with a total of 166 species.
Focusing mainly on the high-lying interior plateau of the grassland biome which also includes alpine grassland communities found at 3000m and above
Bird found in Afromontane forest are also included which consists of localized patches at higher altitudes
This includes the Succulent and Nama Karoo, which consists of semi-desert shrublands, extensive rocky outcrops and very little surface water
These regions are desert and semi-desert habitats also including arid acacia savanna.
These include the sand forest in northern KZN, lowland forest & mangrove swamps along the eastern coastal plains and forest habitats along the Garden Route and Cape Peninsula
This Includes renosterveld, strandveld, mountain fynbos and coastal fynbos, that are confined to the extreme southern and western regions.
This includes the Eastern Cape and the lowveld coastal regions of KZN
Both Pelagic species and seashore birds are include in this list.
This list contains 277 species and is a very good start to further your birding knowledge.
Species included are the more common birds that you will encounter all over Southern Africa which also includes endemic, flagship, and well-known species.
Having a good grasp of this list will help you with the other lists and biomes. The 277 is divided into 9 sub lists of 30 species each.
Sound quality, or the impression of the song is subjective and differs from person to person.
